Articles.Content: Why don't you make a expansion pack that you can make submarines and worry about water pressure and etc. have like water life, coral, underwater easter eggs :3, sunken things (can give you science for finding), abysses to adventure, and maybe even attach subs to rockets and send them to water worlds to do more aqua fun.
I do believe that oceanic exploration is on the What Not To Suggest list, as it's been frequently brought up in the past.
